name: Shenzhen Ecomsun Technology Development Co.,Ltd.
body:
Ecomsun Technology Limited was founded in May 2001 and registered under the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China. Our mail business concerned to PC add-on Card and peripheral accessories. Ecomsun also welcome to Provide OEM and ODM services form Electronice and Coummunication Devices, Network Products and Computer cards which involve SMT assemble business.
